goal.name: eclipse-plugin:create-artifact-dist
goal.description: dispatch to the correct artifact creation goal, based on the specified eclipse plugin type (plugin, site or feature)

goal.name: eclipse-plugin:create-feature-dist
goal.description: create a feature dist file containing only the feature required files and put it in $${maven.eclipse.plugin.dist.dir}

goal.name: eclipse-plugin:create-plugin-dist
goal.description: create a plugin dist file containing only the plugin required files and put it in $${maven.eclipse.plugin.dist.dir}

goal.name: eclipse-plugin:create-site-dist
goal.description: build a single distribution file containing all required plugins and features

goal.name: eclipse-plugin:install-artifact
goal.description: filter and copy the plugin artifact descriptor file to $${basedir}
